description.diamond-pearl:
The user faints. In
return, the Pokémon
taking its place will
have its status and
HP fully restored.

effect.full: User faints.  Its replacement's HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.shortEffect: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
